javelin.model.world

Class Incursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.world.Incursion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Incursion
extends WorldActor
    An attacking Squad, trying to destroy a Town or other WorldActor. Each one that appears grows stronger, which should eventually end the game. An Incursion is similar to an invading Squad while an Invasion refers to the ongoing process of trying to destroy the player's region.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • destroy

        public java.lang.Boolean destroy(Incursion attacker)
        Description copied from class: WorldActor
        Called when an incursion reaches this actor's location.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class WorldActor
        Returns:
        true if this place gets destroyed, false if the Incursion is destroyed or null if neither.
        See Also:
        Incursion#ignoreincursion(Incursion), fight(int, int)

      • fight

        public static boolean fight(int attacker,
                            int defender)
        Helper method for destroy(Incursion). Uses a percentage to decide which combatant wins (adapted from CCR).
        Parameters:
        attacker - Encounter level.
        defender - Encounter level. Integer.MIN_VALUE means an automatic victory for the attacker.
        Returns:
        true if attacker wins.
